title: Exquisite Poison Anthology
description: We've picked their poison,and made it count.Something theycan't live without.Whether it be sweet or quietly deadly,we've overwhelmed them with a medley.It's more than they can bear—Read on if you dare.Exquisite Poison is a collection of poetry & short fiction. The "poison" can be an actual toxin of death, an addiction, a heady love story, a compulsion…read on and find them all.
author: Keira F. Jacobs
